text: The Singapore Flyer is the tallest ferris wheel in the world.AFP:World's biggest observation wheel set to spin in Singapore - Retrieved December 13, 2010 It is next to The Float@Marina Bay. It was officially opened on April 15, 2008. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Buildings and structures in Singapore Category:Ferris wheels Category:2008 establishments in Asia Category:2000s establishments in Singapore
title: Singapore Flyer
